page.title: 09Aboyne Caravan Park
page.content: Aboyne{Caravan Park}is situated one km out of Aboyne on the A93. It is surrounded on three sides by Aboyne {loch}which offers a variety of {recreation}eg wind surfing, fishing with a permit, row boat hire is available, sailing motor boat hire and canoeing. The Caravan Park is in the shelter of the forest and is just off the main road with good road access to sites. The Park offers the{tourist} 3 types of residence. There are 33 static privately owned caravans, and the site has 12 to rent out, 8 chalets and space for 65 touring caravans. The facilities include a shop which sells food and caravan items, showers and toilet block, laundry facility and play area. The site has also a small man made beach.
